c74object.name: ears.vamp~
c74object.description: Extract audio features via Vamp plugins

inlet.digest: Parameters for each of the features (one inlet per feature).

outlet.description: Feature for one of the introduced key; some essentia require multiple outlets (see outlet assistance).

objarg.name: plugin_identifiers
objarg.digest: List of plugin identifiers in the form: libraryid:pluginid[:output].

method.name: getlist
method.description:
The getlist message provides the list of identifiers for the currently installed plugins, organized in sublist by library. A getlist outputs message additionally provides the list of outlets for each plugin, with one additional level of parentheses.
A getlist parameter message, followed by the key identifier of a plugin (libraryid:pluginid, as in the object box arguments) provides the list of parameters for the plugin, along with their default values, ranges and additional information.
A getlist libraries message provides the list of libraries.
A getlist detailed message provides full details about functions, parameters and outputs of each plugins.

method.name: list/llll
method.description: A list or llll with buffer names will be considered as the names of the buffers to be stored and output (also according on the naming attribute). TO DO: should we NOT defer this?

attribute.name: auto
attribute.description: Toggles the ability to automatically assign analysis parameters according to the preferred values of each plugin

attribute.name: summary

entry.name: Inlets 2, 3, 4... (llll)
entry.description: Parameters for each of the features (one inlet per feature)..

entry.name: Outlets 1, 2, 3... (llll/buffer)
entry.description: Feature for the corresponding key. Feature for one of the introduced key; some essentia require multiple outlets (see outlet assistance).

entry.name: The last Outlet (llll)
entry.description: Notifications. Receive notifications from getlist messages.
